definition: Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

sentences.english: Professor FENG Run-shen is engaged in medicine for more than 60 years.
sentences.chinese: 馮潤身教授從醫60餘年，注重醫德，醫技精湛。

sentences.english: Medical ethics do not permit doctors to advertise.
sentences.chinese: 醫德不允許醫生登廣告。

sentences.english: The medical ethics construction has the pivotal function in the hospital management work.
sentences.chinese: 醫德建設在醫院管理工作中具有舉足輕重的作用。

sentences.english: We should strengthen education on medical ethics.
sentences.chinese: 我們要加強醫德醫風的教育。

sentences.english: The experience should be provided for the medical ethics construction in the military hospital in new situation.
sentences.chinese: 爲新形勢下軍隊醫院的醫德醫風建設提供經驗。

sentences.english: A supportive appraisal system is needed in medical ethics construction to guarantee its persistent effect.
sentences.chinese: 醫德醫風建設需要配套的評估體系才能形成長效機制。

sentences.english: We believe with the promotion of medical ethics, the relationship between doctors and patients will become more harmonious.
sentences.chinese: 我們相信隨着醫德的提升，醫患關係將變得更加和諧。

sentences.english: He is modest affability with high responsibility and nobility medical ethics.
sentences.chinese: 爲人謙和，有高度的責任心和高尚醫德。

sentences.english: Good medical ethics and superb skills to infertile couples brought the Gospel.
sentences.chinese: 其良好醫德及精湛醫技給不孕不育夫婦帶來了福音。

sentences.english: We will work harder to improve the professional ethics and style of work of health workers and the quality of medical services.
sentences.chinese: 加強醫德醫風建設，提高醫療服務質量。

sentences.english: Strengthen management, improve the quality of medical ethics to promote the connotation of construction projects.
sentences.chinese: 加強管理，提高素質，促進醫德工程內涵建設。

sentences.english: The process of medical ethics education embodies moral cognition and moral behaviors.
sentences.chinese: 醫德教育過程是道德認知與道德行爲的統一。

sentences.english: Second part, medicine colleges and universities student medical ethics education present situation.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分，醫學院校學生醫德教育的現狀。

definition: benevolent heart and skillful execution (idiom, from Mencius); charitable in thought and deed
to regard it as an honor (idiom)
parade guards (usually spaced out along parade routes)/example/model/pacesetter
to gang up for personal interest (idiom)/to form a clique
proficiency in a particular field (idiom)/skill in a specialized area (idiom)
lit. a horse that brings trouble to its herd (idiom)/fig. troublemaker/black sheep/rotten apple
to show every possible consideration (idiom); meticulous care
